q1: What will Uruguay do to win next world cup?
a1: i think they will qualify and make some noise

q3: How many years do you think Luis Suarez has left for the Uruguay team?
a3: He has worked with the national team for the last 12 years – helping them reach the semi-finals of the 2010 World Cup before winning the Copa America 12 months later.

a4: Martin Silva, I think, is the second oldest player
